TopicTitle: Avro Vulcan With Aim-9X Block II

Articles.Content:
Here it is! The MKII non-armed revision of the Avro Vulcan. Fast, large, stylish, and capable of performing some nice tricks without SAS, this is truly a plane from the Cold War.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Just kidding. You wanted violence, didn't you!

AIM-9X BLK II is now released. I put it one the Vulcan for air-launch validation. It carries a reinforced warhead and much improved aerodynamics. It should be flown with SAS.

Craft Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/68nxesns1tly92n/Avro%20Vulcan%20MKV%20AIM-9X%20II.craft

Destruction of ground targets:

Edited August 11, 2014 by andrew123
Nice, have you tried developing a cluster bomb yet? I'm working on one but it isn't going well.

This is a great attempt at the Vulcan! However the wings have the leading edge of the shuttle in later models, and the rear of the wing isn't swept. If you corrected the wing it would be a great replica
